content.description:
Compare proportional representation in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

In your response, you should do the following:

Define proportional representation.

Describe proportional representation in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

Explain how proportional representation affects party systems for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in Part (B).
content.question:
Respond to parts A, B, and C.

Define proportional representation.

Describe proportional representation in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

Explain how proportional representation affects party systems for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in Part (B).

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
